prcarbon.com/2015/05/seduced-fine-art-ex.snippet: dm contemporary is pleased to present Seduced, an exhibition featuring recent works by four artists: Sun K. Kwak, Martin Mullin, Willy Bo Richardson, and Katsumi Suzuki. The exhibition opens Friday, May 8th, 2015, 6-8pm. On view through June 20th.
